theme: International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
entities: International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
summary: The Security Council, recalling resolution 1966 (2010), adopted on 22 December 2010, and considering the nomination by the Secretary-General, decides to appoint Mr. Hassan Bubacar Jallow as Prosecutor of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals with effect from 1 March 2012 for a term of four years; Noting the Prosecutor may also hold the office of Prosecutor of the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda (ICTR), and recalling the Mechanism's branch for the ICTR shall commence functioning on 1 July 2012.
